creditline: Anonymous gift in memory of John L. and Ruth M. McKelvey
description: Seal paste box with blue and white underglaze depicting a landscape scene; round box; white ground with blue design; image of a building on the edge of the water, with a dock on the LR; bottom has landscape elements on it: rocks, plants and grasses along one side and six characters on the bottom
title: Seal paste box with blue and white underglaze depicting a landscape scene
